title: Team seeking a Support main for Bronze and Silver tournaments.
body:
Hello! We are seeking out a nice outspoken support to assist our team!  

We are all very friendly and super funny.  I am our team captain playing Mid as well as ADC.  We'd like our support to be very map aware and comfortable speaking to us as a whole.  To play in our tournaments you must be in Silver or Bronze this season as well as last.  Your flex and three's rank does not matter.  You also may continue to solo / duo through our season, even if you get to gold or higher!  However you must be Silver or below when signing up.

We ask that you be available to play with us 2 - 4 times a week.  We have a discord server that we speak in that is a required part of being on our team.  We believe it helps us grow together! Feel free to add me!  We are also accepting any Top or Junglers we have two people who currently are filling those spots but we would ideally like to have another just in case for whatever reason we need someone to fill in.

Can't wait to hear from you!  
-Mady

replies.body: Add me iron shane im french but i understant english , i main top mid jg supp and i am gold5 solo silver1 flex
Is this for NA or OCE?

hey guys.. im a bronze supprot main with an 80% winrate for Blitz and a 4.00:1 KDA, if ur interested.. add me 
IGN: terrythebeast

I'm a supp main, with experience with all types of supports. I have 4 supports Tier 7, and am fairly good with almost all main support champs. I'm silver 5 currently and climbing. I'm looking for team to play with because I feel like my skills will get better working with other players, and I can add a lot to the team as well. If you have any other questions let me know, thanks for the consideration.
I'm plat but im keen to play in my silver smurf ;) WE CAN WIN THERE TOURNAMENTS

I'm a jungle main but will happily fill the support role as well. I am B3 now and have been climbing since coming back into League. Would love to join!{{champion:32}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:19}}

If this is still open, I'm a support/top main. My rank last session was b3 and this season I'm S4. If be happy to play either top or support, and speaking for myself I have fairly decent map awareness. If have to check if I could get Discord, but I can do that in a few hours. I'd be able to play 3-4 time a week on average.    :)

Thanks,
Time Criminal

EDIT: What time zone is this in? I'm NZ. 

EDIT 2: Wait is this OCE? I'm gonna be embarrassed if it's not...   :P
